review: easy to install up & running in < 30 min
author: James A croft

review: I love this product!  It was incredibly simple to hook up and has tons of things you can do with it.
author: Gina Jones

review: I got this for a good price and use it often, but I prefer my Roku. My Fire Stick lags often, is sometimes buggy, and doesn't have as many channels to choose from.
author: Jessica Blount

review: Does what I need it to do for the guest room
author: Jonathan

review: I did not have good luck with Fire stick. It froze constantly every 10 seconds. I had much better luck with Roku.
author: Ken

review: Watch something on it every night.
author: sheilagal1

review: One of the best setup processes EVER in an electronic product.  It arrives signed into your specific account, and the video walkthrough makes setup a breeze.  Great interface as well.  As a bonus, if you download the "Fire TV" app, you can use voice searching through your phone, which works wonderfully.  The price can't be beat.  I will be purchasing a couple more of these to add to our other TVs.
author: D. J. Woods "Mom of Three"

review: THIS IS A GREAT BUY! I LOVE IT I HAVE FOUND MYSELF A NEW TOY AT 71 YEARS OF AGE.
author: lester gorham
